tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE targets (id INT PRIMARY KEY,
name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
access_level VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
target_status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE user_access (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    target_id INT NOT NULL,
    privilege_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES targets(target_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (privilege_id) REFERENCES privileges(privilege_id)
);

CREATE TABLE accesses (
  access_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  access_type VARCHAR(50),
  access_date TIMESTAMP,
  target_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (target_id) REFERENCES targets(target_id)
);

CREATE TABLE unauthorized_access (
  unauthorized_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  technique_id INT,
  privilege_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES social_engineering(technique_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (privilege_id) REFERENCES privileges(privilege_id)
);
